frontmatter.title: Exploring Contribution Models for Design Systems

meta.desc: Explore the pros and cons of two different contribution models for design systems: building components on their own and "pulling the contributions". Learn how each model affects design system scalability, motivation, and collaboration between product and design teams. Discover which model is best suited for your company's needs and goals.
